newsitem.title: NORWAY: Norway's Dec CPI rises 1.8 pct yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: Norway's Dec CPI rises 1.8 pct yr/yr.

text.p: NORWAY CONSUMER PRICES DEC 1996 NOV 1996 DEC 1995
NOTE -- Economists forecast a year-on-year rise in December of 1.8 percent and for inflation to increase by an average 0.05 percent from November.

The Statstics Bureau attributed the slight decline in the CPI index in December from November to a reduction in non-discounted gasoline prices, lower apple prices and sales discounts on some clothing items.
